description: Manages Application Groups for premium eventhubs namespace.

commands.name: az eventhubs namespace application-group create
commands.summary: Creates an application group for an EventHub namespace.
commands.syntax:
az eventhubs namespace application-group create --client-app-group-id
                                                --name
                                                --namespace-name
                                                --resource-group
                                                [--is-enabled {false, true}]
                                                [--policy-config]
examples: az eventhubs namespace application-group create --namespace-name mynamespace -g MyResourceGroup --name myAppGroup --client-app-group-identifier NamespaceSASKeyName=keyname --throttling-policy-config name=policy1 metric-id=IncomingMessages rate-limit-threshold=10000 --throttling-policy-config name=policy2 metric-id=IncomingBytes rate-limit-threshold=20000

commands.name: az eventhubs namespace application-group delete
commands.summary: Delete an ApplicationGroup for a Namespace.

commands.name: az eventhubs namespace application-group list
commands.summary: List a list of application groups for a Namespace.

commands.name: az eventhubs namespace application-group show
commands.summary: Get an ApplicationGroup for a Namespace.

commands.name: az eventhubs namespace application-group update
commands.summary: Update an ApplicationGroup for a Namespace.
commands.syntax:
az eventhubs namespace application-group update [--add]
                                                [--application-group-name]
                                                [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--ids]
                                                [--is-enabled {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                [--namespace-name]
                                                [--policies]
                                                [--remove]
                                                [--resource-group]
                                                [--set]
                                                [--subscription]
